comments: Middle name is sometimes spelled with one 's': Ferguson but in Dict. National Biogr., Supp. 2 (1901-1911) the spelling is Fergusson.
examples: Iris reticulata var. histrioides G.F.Wilson in Gard. Chron., ser. 3, 9:117 (24 Jan 1891), basionym of Iriodictyum histrioides.
source: Desmond, Dict. Brit. & Irish Bot. & Hort. (1994), Barnhart, Biograph. Notes upon Botanists (1965)
